ic-scroll-offset - The Scroll Offset Attribute

Summary

The ic-scroll-offset attribute tells Intercooler to apply an offset when scrolling to a given target. This can be useful when you need an element to be positioned offest from the top of the viewport when using the ic-scroll-to-target attribute.

Syntax

The value of the attribute should a valid integer

Dependencies

ic-scroll-offset has no dependency implications.
